title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
Experience the ultimate gaming keyboard with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard. Featuring a hybrid mechanical switch that combines the tactile click of a blue switch with the smooth membrane, this keyboard offers the perfect balance of precision and comfort. The OLED smart display allows for customizable gifs, game info, and even discord messages right at your fingertips. 

Crafted with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, this keyboard is not only durable but also sleek and stylish. The per-key RGB illumination adds a vibrant touch to your gaming setup, while the premium magnetic wrist rest provides full palm support and comfort during long gaming sessions.

Compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, this keyboard is versatile and suitable for all types of gamers. With IP32 water resistance, you can game worry-free knowing your keyboard is protected from spills and splashes. Upgrade your gaming experience with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard today.
